name: James Patterson's Women's Murder Club: Twice in a Blue Moon
name_original: James Patterson's Women's Murder Club: Twice in a Blue Moon
description:
James Patterson's Women's Murder Club: Twice in a Blue Moon is a puzzle game developed by Floodlight Games. It came out on 15-09-2009. It was published by Oberon Media.
You can play James Patterson's Women's Murder Club: Twice in a Blue Moon on PC.
